session.description: The workshop sought to draw attention to the potential benefits of the conjunction of Open Data and Language Processing Technologies; and address it societal, economic, legal and technical challenges.

tweets.content: @opendatacon: #IODC16 videos: Workshop on open data and language processing technologies https://youtu.be/hsuCwyC2nEo pic.twitter.com/YyyeBUapIZ
@a_salamanca: Open Data and #Language Processing Technologies: An opportunity not to be missed. #IODC16pic.twitter.com/42wGpD9zmG
@langune: Workshop on open data and language processing technologies. 5/10/16, 15:30h. IFEMA-Madrid. http://opendatacon.org/agenda/pre-events/open-linguistic-data/ … #IODC16

conference_notes: As final conclusions, the challenges that will be faced in the near future are information fragmentation; coordination and open licenses, as well as privacy concerns must be solved, but open data and LPT are a good opportunity to create value.
name: Workshop on open data and language processing technologies: An opportunity not to be missed
